00076         static bool archive(const char* zipfile, const char** filenames)
00077                 {
00078                 U_TRACE(1, "UZIP::archive(%S,%p)", zipfile, filenames)
00079 
00080                 bool result = (U_SYSCALL(zip_archive, "%S,%p", zipfile, filenames) == 0);
00081 
00082                 U_RETURN(result);
00083                 }
00084
